arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta admits it was not an ‘easy decision’ to part ways with Granit Xhaka
arts.sum: “When we signed him, it was for the right reason, because he was playing a different role. But he was excellent, when you see him playing for the national team and with Bayer Leverkusen in a deeper role he did very well, as well as the necessity of the team or the understanding of the manager or the coach about a player or the chemistry that he can create around other players as well.

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta is ‘not surprised’ with the performances of Sunderland
arts.sum: Mikel Arteta assessed the strength of Sunderland, the next Premier League opposition for Arsenal . Granit Xhaka, formerly at Arsenal, has been a valuable asset as club captain, Wilson Isidor is proving himself as a top level striker, and the strategic investment into the squad for Regis Le Bris is paying dividends.

arts.ttl: Granit Xhaka’s latest comments on Arsenal show just how much he has changed since leaving
arts.sum: Granit Xhaka is set to face Arsenal in a competitive fixture for the first time since leaving the North London club. Arsenal travel to Sunderland...

arts.ttl: Arsenal Predicted Lineup vs. Sunderland: Zubimendi Returns on Wearside
arts.sum: The Gunners are without an array of attackers for Saturday’s trip to the Stadium of Light.

arts.ttl: How Mikel Arteta convinced Granit Xhaka to stay at Arsenal after 2019 fallout with fans
arts.sum: Granit Xhaka may be a Sunderland hero right now, but his affinity with Arsenal runs deep, even in spite of one major incident six years...

arts.ttl: Boost for Arsenal as an important Sunderland man misses game
arts.sum: Sunderland have impressed since their promotion back to the Premier League at the start of this season. The Black Cats strengthened their squad with several key signings in the last transfer window and have quickly established themselves as one of the league’s most competitive teams. arts.ttl: All 10 Premier League weekend predictions - Week 11
arts.sum: There are five games taking place on Saturday and Sunday this week and Tom Hill predicts the outcome of all the matches before the next international break.

arts.ttl: Sunderland vs Arsenal: Stay Grounded Amid Hype
arts.sum: To state the obvious, Arsenal have many players who can change a game in an instant, a rock-solid defence, and an exceptional set-piece conversion record. It’ll be difficult to get a result against them on Saturday — there’s little point getting too down about it, or wallowing in post-mortems after the event; it is what […]

arts.ttl: "Could not care less" - Arsenal sent 'ugly' demand for Sunderland Xhaka reunion
arts.sum: Arsenal fans should have no problem with their side claiming the "ugliest, scrappiest" win over high-flying Sunderland in Saturday's Premier League showdown, Gunners expert Charles Watts exclusively tells Sports Mole.

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta hints Arsenal could be set for a surprise injury boost against Sunderland
arts.sum: The Gunners have a plethora of attackers out injured, including Martin Odegaard, Kai Havertz, Viktor Gyokeres, Gabriel Martinelli , Noni Madueke and Gabriel Jesus.
